item.description:
Our first Afterwork mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Financial District.

Our first afterwork event of the year will be on Thursday February 23rd at Houston's in Faneuil Hall near Quincy Market. I've been hearing great things about this venue as a happy hour hotspot from many professionals around the city. So come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend.

Meeting Details: My picture is also on the site so I should not be hard to find. If your picture is up on the site do RSVP and i'll look for you as well. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.

See you there! Steven

60 State St . Boston Ma 02109

Public Transportation: Green line to Goverment Center.

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Afterwork Mixer at Houston's near Faneuil Hall
